1. App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/blockswipepuzzle-puzzle-game/id6670795004

    I’m excited to introduce BlockSwipePuzzle, my new puzzle game that puts a fresh spin on the classic block puzzle genre. As a solo indie developer from Norway, I wanted to create a game that’s both easy to jump into and strategically challenging to master.


    What is BlockSwipePuzzle?
    In BlockSwipePuzzle, you place blocks on a 9x9 grid, aiming to clear rows and columns for points. But here’s the twist: You swipe to place the blocks and you can only have 4 blocks of the same color in any row or column at a time. This unique mechanic adds depth to your strategy and makes each move matter.

    Why Check It Out?

    • Easy to Learn, Hard to Master: The gameplay is simple and approachable, but achieving high scores takes real skill and planning.
    • No Time Limits: Play at your own pace without the pressure of a ticking clock—perfect for both quick sessions and longer gameplay marathons.
    • Play Offline: Enjoy the game wherever you are, even when you don’t have an internet connection.

    Looking for Your Feedback!
    BlockSwipePuzzle is still new, and I’m constantly working on updates and improvements. I’d love to hear what you think—whether it’s about the gameplay, balance, or any new features you’d like to see. Your feedback means the world and will help shape the future of the game.

    Check out BlockSwipePuzzle on the App Store here:
    https://apps.apple.com/app/blockswipepuzzle-puzzle-game/id6670795004
